TextView.android:text: Welcome to SMTEC WildUser Mobile Application Experiment! This is a New text entry evaluation methodology based on experience sampling method (ESM). Users Must Read the instructions carefully before they begin the experiment. This is a 30-days experiment. User must engage in the experiment daily. The samples will appear 10 times/tasks per day through out the period of 4 weeks. All the Users must set-up their default keyboard as google keyboard. This can be done using the settings page in the menu. You are allowed to use either STK (Standard Touch keyboard) or SGK (Standard Gesture Keyboard)User can also use any convenient method of typing such as single thumb, two thumbs, and single finger.You can engage in the experiment by selecting your most active-time.Active Time should be selected from the top menu.Users are not allowed to copy phrases from the displayed text or within typing box itself.Your typing duration, typing speed, number of errors made will be recorded. You will be asked to complete a questionnaire at the end of the experiment. Experiment Goal: To test the speed, accuracy, preference, text entry method, preferred hand posture from each experimentee. Using the above data we report the performance about Standard Touch keyboard and Standard Gesture Keyboard in the Wild.
